update sms_passage_group_detail set group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, passage_id = #{passageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, route_type = #{routeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cmcp = #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select d.*,s.cmcp passage_cmcp,s.name,s.status, s.type, s.access_code, s.mobile_size, s.packets_size, s.code, s.sign_mode, s.status from sms_passage_group_detail d,sms_passage s where d.passage_id = s.id and d.group_id = #{0} order by d.priority asc
mapper.update: update sms_passage_group_detail set passage_id = #{passageId} where group_id = #{groupId}
